FuncDef:
The network command enables RIP for a specified network segment on an interface.
The undo network command disables RIP from a specified network segment on an interface. The network command enables RIP for a specified network segment on an interface. The undo network command disables RIP from a specified network segment on an interface. By default, RIP is disabled for the specified network segment on an interface.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the address of the network segment for which RIP is enabled.
The value is in dotted decimal notation.

ExtraInfo: The network command enables RIP for the interface on the specified network segment.
